Package presentation

Class ordersController

java.lang.Object
presentation.ordersController
public class ordersController
extends java.lang.Object
Orders controller - creates the flow between the orders' scene and the application. Has the methods which perform the operations insert and display all on the orders table, on a top level by sending the data from the user to the business layer of the application.
